title: Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, Tata, Renault post the highest-ever share of sales from rural markets in 2023
description: Senior industry executives ET spoke to said even in the rural markets, the gap in incomes between varied sets of consumers has been triggering demand more at the higher end of the market, which is expected to eventually percolate down and make broad based the recovery over the next few quarters.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
